transcription.text: The Beating Heart is a large-scale projection, which is a key element of Evolver. At ACMI, it appears within Works of Nature on the edge of the VR experience. The work represents the deep research, application of creative technologies and the scientific partnerships that Marshmallow Laser Feast undertake in their artistic process - it is based on actual blood flow data provided by Fraunhofer Institute for Digital Medicine MEVIS.
